holidays.title: Chant at the Moon Day
holidays.description: Ah, summer, where the days are long and the nights are longer.

holidays.title: Indian Independence Day
holidays.description: Join in the celebration of what Nehru called India's "Tryst with Destiny."

holidays.title: National Relaxation Day
holidays.description: Sometimes, you just have to stop and smell the roses.

holidays.title: Assumption of Mary (Spain)
holidays.description: Let's commemorate Mary's ascension into heaven after her death by celebrating the Assumption of Mary.

holidays.title: Check the Chip Day
holidays.description: This Check the Chip Day, use microchipping to keep your pets safe.

holidays.title: Feast of Assumption (Chile)
holidays.description: Join the Chileans in honoring the Assumption Feast and Mary's elevation to Heaven.

holidays.title: Feast of the Assumption
holidays.description: Christians observe the Virgin Mary’s bodily ascent to heaven at the end of her life.

holidays.title: Flooding of the Nile
holidays.description: The Flooding of The Nile is an event shrouded in myth, history, and modern-day mystery.

holidays.title: Foundation of Old Panama City
holidays.description: Panama City is the oldest European settlement on the Pacific and a UNESCO heritage site.

holidays.title: Founding of Asuncion in Paraguay
holidays.description: In Paraguay and Newfoundland, people rise despite everything. Both are very resilient.

holidays.title: Liberation Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the restoration of national independence that was lost for 36 years under Japanese rule.

holidays.title: Liechtenstein National Day
holidays.description: August 15 is Liechtenstein National Day. Are you ready to celebrate?

holidays.title: Malaita Province Day
holidays.description: Celebrate this special holiday with the people of Malatia Province and show your pride!

holidays.title: National Acadian Day
holidays.description: Happy Acadian Day to all Acadians in Canada; we are celebrating with you today!

holidays.title: National Back To School Prep Day
holidays.description: Do you have all the supplies that you need? Is the homework station set up?

holidays.title: National Jean Day
holidays.description: Jean is one of the most iconic names in history and today we celebrate it.

holidays.title: National Leathercraft Day
holidays.description: It’s not just a craft, it’s an art. Celebrate the art of leathercrafting today!

holidays.title: National Lemon Meringue Pie Day
holidays.description: Take your taste buds on an unforgettable journey with the amazing lemon meringue pie!

holidays.title: National Philip Day
holidays.description: Learn more about the name Philip and the people who share the same name.

holidays.title: No Sponge Bob Day
holidays.description: Today all residents of Bikini Bottom, except SpongeBob SquarePants, have their version of the Burning Man.

holidays.title: St Mary's Day
holidays.description: St. Mary’s Day events and processions attract many thousands of visitors every year.

holidays.title: World Greatness Day
holidays.description: This special holiday is your chance to celebrate the unsung heroes in your life.

holidays.title: Ben Affleck’s Birthday
holidays.description: Find out about this Hollywood actor’s exciting journey toward cinematic stardom and artistic greatness.

holidays.title: Chief Keef’s Birthday
holidays.description: The Chicago rapper Chief Keef is the pioneer of the ‘drill music’ subgenre.

holidays.title: Destiny Morales’s Birthday
holidays.description: This social media star is creating her legacy one post at a time.

holidays.title: Jennifer Lawrence’s Birthday
holidays.description: Today, we're celebrating the actress known for her versatility on-screen and her accessible, honest off-screen persona.

holidays.title: Jill Vertes’s Birthday
holidays.description: This popular “Dance Mom” hasn’t forgotten her time on the show and the friends she made.

holidays.title: Joe Jonas’s Birthday
holidays.description: Joe Jonas’ life and career have been nothing short of a successful adventure.

holidays.title: Matt Lobster’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented content creator is creating his success one post at a time!

holidays.title: Melinda Gates’s Birthday
holidays.description: As a successful entrepreneur, philanthropist, and mother, she's a good example showing how it’s all possible.

holidays.title: Napoleon Bonaparte’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let's take a look at the life of Napoleon Bonaparte, the French military and political leader.

holidays.title: Natasha Bure’s Birthday

holidays.title: Nipsey Hussle’s Birthday
